| HistoryText             = The artificial intelligence Iron Man sentries were deployed in the ruins of [[Stark Tower]] after it had been destroyed by rogue [[Inhumans (Inhomo supremis)|Inhumans]] in order to guard what remained of the structure until clean-up.

Several of these drones were taken down by [[Anton Vanko (Whiplash) (Earth-616)|Whiplash]] when he attacked the ruins of the Tower looking for any salvageable pieces of technology.{{r|Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 4 15}}

| Notes                   = * These Iron Man Sentries are an adaptation of the [[Iron Legion (Earth-199999)|Iron Legion]] as seen in the film ''[[Avengers: Age of Ultron]]''.
